metadata.title: MyContador
metadata.description: Get total control of your counter

metadata.title: MyContador
metadata.description: Get total control of your counter

landing.description: Manage you water usage by providing access to real-time information about water meters and consumption.

features.subtitle: Smart Counter Management
features.description: Facilitate the task of the reviewer when managing all the counters and allows the users to have an estimate of their next invoice before receiving it in addition to seeing the data from your accountant.

businessman.title: Efficient Counter Management
businessman.description: Enables administrators to quickly and easily add, edit, and delete water counters from different pools

survey.title: Personalized Consumption Information
survey.description: Users can access detailed information about their water consumption, as well as estimates for their next bill, helping them make informed decisions about their usage

advertising.title: Notifications and Alerts
advertising.description: Users receive notifications and alerts for important events related to their counters, such as scheduled readings, abnormal consumption alerts, and status updates

conference_call.title: Multi-User Access:
conference_call.description: Allows multiple administrators to be assigned to each community, facilitating collaboration and access to counter information

bar_chart.title: Real-Time Data Visualization
bar_chart.description: Users can access real-time data from their counters, including interactive charts and metrics that reflect their consumption and historical trends

multiple_devices.title: Multi-Device Access
multiple_devices.description: The application is accessible from both web and Android devices, allowing users to manage their water consumption anytime and anywhere

download_app_landing.get_app_description: The app is faster and has more features

roles.message: In this moment, the admin mode is only on the

add_counter.welcome_message: Please add your first counter to start

counter_info.no_documents_message: There are no documents for this counter
counter_info.accounting_month_description: Number of month in which the water is distributed
counter_info.limit_description: Maximum liters of water that can be used depending on the meters of the farm
counter_info.zone_sector_description: Zone where the water comes from
counter_info.state_description: Counter status: Open, Closed, Bad, etc.
counter_info.multiplier_description: Multiplier that applies to water consumption
counter_info.last_reading_date_description: Date the current reading was updated
